#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll              long long
#define llu             unsigned long long
#define vi              vector < int >
#define vs              vector < string >
#define pii             pair < int , int >
#define pb              push_back
#define mp              make_pair
#define ff              first
#define ss              second
#define TR(it,v)        for( __typeof((v).begin())it = (v).begin() ; it != (v).end() ; it++ )
#define mod             1000000007
#define inf             2000000000
#define dbg(x)          { cout<< #x << ": " << (x) << endl; }
#define all(x)          x.begin(),x.end()

#define le(i)			scanf("%d",&i)
#define lel(i) 			scanf("%lld",&i)

#define loop(i,k,n)     for(int i=k;i<n;i++)
#define rloop(i,k,n)    for(int i=k;i>=n;i--)


#define beg             int t;cin>>t;while(t--)



#define maxi(a,b)                     ( (a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))
#define mini(a,b)                     ( (a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))
#define ABS(a,b)     ( (a) > (b) ? (a-b) : (b-a))




bool h[27];
int cnt=0;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t=0,l=0;
    string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s;
        cnt=0;
        l=s.length();
        loop(i,0,27) h[i]=0;
        loop(i,0,l)
        {
            if(!h[s[i]-'a']) { cnt++; h[s[i]-'a']=1;}
        }
        if(cnt%2==1) cout<<"Counter Terrorist"<<'\n';
        else cout<<"Terrorist"<<'\n';
    }

}
